definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
to make trouble without reason (idiom); to be deliberately provocative

sentences.english: Nine bead application of my vexatious rights to provoke nan peja trouble.
sentences.chinese: 九珠應用本人的無理取鬧權益惹楠佩費事。

sentences.english: Peace the inurbane parties and maintain the stability of society.
sentences.chinese: 對申訴無理的當事人做息訴工作，維護社會的穩定。

sentences.english: Like the Hindus, the Arabs worked freely with irrationals.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉伯人也象印度人那樣隨便使用無理數。

sentences.english: Unjustified pride and belief in juche - self-reliance - remains perhaps the single biggest barrier to reform in the North.
sentences.chinese: 無理的自尊和自主仍然是朝鮮改革的最大單個障礙。

sentences.english: Management dismissed the union's behavior as irresponsible and unreasonable.
sentences.chinese: 管理層把工會行爲視作不負責任和無理要求草草處理。

sentences.english: Cunning and vicious people often come to the shop to provoke unwarranted trouble.
sentences.chinese: 經常有刁惡的人來店裏無理取鬧。

sentences.english: He had to bite the bullet and give in to his boss's unreasonable demands.
sentences.chinese: 他只好勉爲其難，聽從老闆無理的要求。

sentences.english: Don't get fresh,or I'll tell your boss.
sentences.chinese: 不要無理取鬧，否則我告訴你的老闆。

sentences.english: It has continued to act unreasonably.
sentences.chinese: 它還在繼續無理蠻橫的行爲。

sentences.english: I won't stand for his unreasonable demands any longer.
sentences.chinese: 我再也不會容忍他的無理要求了。

sentences.english: When this rotating speed ratio is an irrational number, the distribution of grinding track becomes finer.
sentences.chinese: 當轉速比爲無理數時，研磨軌跡的分佈較緻密。

sentences.english: I know I just wanna lean on your shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝你，不介意我偶爾對你的蠻橫無理。

sentences.english: Cats are less of a bother than dogs when they misbehave.
sentences.chinese: 當它們無理取鬧時，狗比貓更麻煩。

sentences.english: But it would never occur to anyone to call their method planless and irrational.
sentences.chinese: 但誰都不會想到稱他們的方法是無計劃無理性的。

sentences.english: The general and his aides spoke disrespectfully about several administration officials.
sentences.chinese: 將軍和他的助手對數位政府官員發表了無理的言論。

sentences.english: The logical definition of the irrational number is rather sophisticated.
sentences.chinese: 無理數的邏輯主義是頗有些不自然的。

definition: to question/to ask questions/to inquire/to bring to account/to interrogate
to disobey/to violate/to separate/to go against
to do with difficulty/to force sb to do sth/reluctant/barely enough
to apologize for an offense/to offer one's apology for a fault
to comment/to talk about/to discuss/discussion/CL:個|个[ge4]
to criticize/to find fault with/to denounce
